JFG PDF Template â€“ Usage

This directory holds JSON templates that drive the JFG PDF Generator.

Each JSON file should include fields like:

{
  "title": "Your Report Title",
  "subtitle": "Optional subtitle text",
  "sections": [
    {
      "heading": "Section heading",
      "paragraphs": [
        "First paragraph of this section.",
        "Second paragraph..."
      ]
    }
  ],
  "footer": "Footer text for the bottom of each report."
}
